price: They were afflicted by the evil consequences of their deeds, and they were overwhelmed by what they used to ridicule.
arabic: فَأَصَابَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا عَمِلُواْ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
